caption: A man is working on a computer in an office. In the dark of night, a man stands by the roadside. A white car arrives, and a woman in white gets out. They meet in front of a store, then go indoors and sit down to talk. They shake hands and share a tight embrace. The woman picks up a note and starts reading it. A man is using a DVD player at home. A woman is talking to him, and tears fall as she leaves. A man stands in a high-rise building making a phone call to a man inside a house. A black car is driving on the road. A man steps out and arrives at the entrance of a building. He finds the man from the high-rise and pulls out a gun.
